title: The Dolls
description: Boys want them. Girls want to be them. Someone wants them dead.Peregrine Marceau and Chloe St. Pierre are the Dolls. Impossibly beautiful and dangerously powerful, they hold the town of Carrefour under their spell. Yet newcomer Eveny Cheval is not so easily swayed by their glamour - until she discovers she is a Doll too. And when a killer sneaks past the locked gates of Carrefour, only the Dolls' combined powers can stop the murderer in their midst.Sultry, seductive, irresistible... welcome to Carrefour.
author: Kiki Sullivan
